snippet: The execution of a Texas man was briefly blocked Wednesday, but is back on schedule after a federal appeals court overturned a judge’s order halting the lethal injection.
abstract: Federal appeals court overturns judge's order to halt execution of Tommy Lynn Sells in Texas.
lead_paragraph: The execution of a Texas man was briefly blocked Wednesday, but is back on schedule after a federal appeals court overturned a judge’s order halting the lethal injection.

headline.main: Texas: Drug Dispute Briefly Blocks Execution
headline.print_headline: Texas: Drug Dispute Briefly Blocks Execution
